snippet.title: "Tall Tales" Extended Trailer: Official Skylanders Giants l Skylanders Giants l Skylanders
snippet.description:
Watch "Tall Tales" Extended Trailer: Official Skylanders Giants l Skylanders Giants l Skylanders
#skylandersgiants

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/user/skylandersgame?sub_confirmation=1
  
Connect with Skylanders
Website: https://www.skylanders.com/video-games/skylanders-imaginators
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/skylandersthegame/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SkylandersGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/skylandersgame

About Skylanders Giants: 
Thousands of years ago, the Giant Skylanders fought epic battles in Skylands, but were banished to Earth. With a new threat looming, it's time to bring them back to join forces with the Skylanders to defeat KAOS. Only you can put them on the Portal of Power™ to unleash their strength in the ultimate battle to save Skylands!


"Tall Tales" Extended Trailer: Official Skylanders Giants l Skylanders Giants l Skylanders
https://www.youtube.com/user/SkylandersGame
